short_summary: Radio Frequency (RF) Shelter, including input/output (I/O) Plate, Electromagnetic Interference (EMI) Hardened Lights, Ventilation System and User Manual.
description: A portable Radio Frequency (RF) Shelter that includes input/output (I/O) Plate, Electromagnetic Interference (EMI) Hardened Lights, Ventilation System, and User Manual, to create a shielded test space that prevents Radio Frequency and Electromagnetic frequencies from entering and exiting, is required.
full_summary:
### Tender Sought: Radio Frequency (RF) Shelter for Portable Use

#### Summary

The Department of National Defence seeks bids for the procurement of a portable, radio frequency (RF) shelter through a Request for Proposal (RFP). This shelter, including an input/output (I/O) plate, electromagnetic interference (EMI)-hardened lights, a ventilation system, and a user manual, will be used to create a shielded test space for preventing RF and electromagnetic frequencies from entering and exiting.

#### Requirements

The Department of National Defence requires one (1) Radio Frequency (RF) Shelter, including an I/O plate, EMI-hardened lights, ventilation system, and user manual, to create a portable shielded test space that prevents RF and electromagnetic frequencies from entering and exiting.

#### Description

- Quantity: 1 unit
- Includes: I/O plate, EMI-hardened lights, ventilation system, and user manual
- Must be delivered to the National Capital Region (NCR) by: March 28, 2024

#### Tender Requirements

- Must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive
- The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract

#### Notice of Proposed Procurement

Please note that this bid solicitation cancels and supersedes a previous bid solicitation number W8474-248421, dated June 14, 2023, with a closing date of July 21, 2023. A debriefing session will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted a bid in the previous solicitation.

#### Important Dates

- Amendment Date: October 23, 2023
- Tender Closing Date: October 23, 2023, at 14:00:00
- Expected Contract Start Date: November 3, 2023
- Expected Contract End Date: March 28, 2024

#### Additional Information

- Contact Brooke Monette at brooke.monette@forces.gc.ca for more information about this tender
- Bidders can submit their proposals in either English or French languages
- Required documents can be found in the provided links

### Note

Please be advised that the Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The Department of National Defence encourages all qualified suppliers to participate in the tender process.

I removed unnecessary information, corrected translations, and rephrased key sections to ensure they were easier to read and understand. I fixed
